ARABIC: قُلْ مَا سَأَلْتُكُم مِّنْ أَجْرٍ فَهُوَ لَكُمْ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَى ٱللَّهِ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ شَهِيدٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Say: 'I have not asked you for any wage - it is all for you. My wage is the responsibility of Allah alone. He is witness of everything.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Say: "The reward I ask is for yourself. My reward is due from none but God; and He is witness over everything."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Say to them: “Whatever recompense I might ask of you, it shall be yours. My recompense is with Allah, and He is witness over everything.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Say, "Whatever reward I ask you (for my preaching) will be for your own good. No one can reward me except God. He is the Witness over all things."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Say, “Whatever fee I might have asked from you upon this, is yours; my reward is only upon Allah; and He is Witness over all things.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Say: "Whatever wage I might have asked of you is yours. My wage is from Allah only, and He is a Witness over all things."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Say: Whatever reward I have asked of you, that is only for yourselves; my reward is only with Allah, and He is a witness of all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Say: 'I have asked no wage of you; that shall be yours. My wage falls only upon God; and He is witness over everything.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Say: Whatever reward I might have asked of you is yours. My reward is the affair of Allah only. He is Witness over all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Say, "If I have asked you for any recompense, you can keep it. It is God alone who will reward me: He is the witness of all things."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Say thou: whatsoever hire might have asked of you is yours; my hire is with Allah only. And He is of everything a Witness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Say, ‘Whatever reward I may have asked you is for your own good. My [true] reward lies only with Allah, and He is witness to all things.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Say: "No reward do I ask of you: it is (all) in your interest: my reward is only due from Allah: And He is witness to all things."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Say (O Muhammad SAW): "Whatever wage I might have asked of you is yours. My wage is from Allah only. and He is Witness over all things."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Say: 'I ask no wage of you; that shall be yours. My wage is only upon Allah and He is Witness over everything'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Say, “Whatever compensation I have asked of you, is yours. My compensation comes only from God, and He is Witness over all things.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Say, "Whatever payment I might have asked of you - it is yours. My payment is only from Allah, and He is, over all things, Witness."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [34:47] Say, to them: ‘I have not asked you, in return for [my] warning and delivering the Message [to you], any reward, since it is for [the benefit of] you, in other words, I do not ask you for any reward in return for this. Indeed my reward lies only with God, and He is Witness over all things’, observing [them all], knowing my truthfulness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Say) to them, Muhammad: (Whatever reward) or exchange (I might have asked of you is yours. My reward is the affair of Allah only. He is Witness over all things) regarding your works.
